tool_description: The Canada Geo API provides various endpoints to retrieve geolocation information and perform distance calculations within Canada. From retrieving geolocation data and reverse geocoding to calculating distances and obtaining step-by-step directions, this API provides the tools necessary to enhance the functionality and user experience of your applications.
name: The Canada Geo API
title: The Canada Geo API

api_list.name: Directions between Two Locations
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves directions between two locations in Canada.

required_parameters.name: start_lon
required_parameters.description: The longitude of the starting point.

required_parameters.name: end_lat
required_parameters.description: The latitude of the ending point.

required_parameters.name: end_lon
required_parameters.description: The longitude of the ending point.

required_parameters.name: start_lat
required_parameters.description: The latitude of the starting point.

optional_parameters.name: distance_unit
optional_parameters.description:
The unit of distance measurement (default: km).
Supports: **km**, **mi**

api_list.name: Reverse Distance Calculation
api_list.description: This endpoint calculates the distance between two locations in Canada.

required_parameters.name: start_address
required_parameters.description: The start address of the route.

required_parameters.name: stop_address
required_parameters.description: The stop address of the route.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description:
The unit of distance measurement (default: **km**).
Supports: **km**, **mi,** **ft**, **yd**

api_list.name: Distance Calculation
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to calculate the distance between two locations in Canada.

required_parameters.name: lat1
required_parameters.description: The latitude of the first location.

required_parameters.name: lon2
required_parameters.description: The longitude of the second location.

required_parameters.name: lat2
required_parameters.description: The latitude of the second location.

required_parameters.name: lon1
required_parameters.description: The longitude of the first location.

api_list.name: Reverse Geocoding
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to perform reverse geocoding to get location information based on latitude and longitude in Canada.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to search facilities in Canada based on the provided parameters.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The type of facility to search.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

api_list.name: Facilities Lookup
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to get facilities in Canada based on the provided parameters.

required_parameters.name: prov
required_parameters.description: The province name to filter the facilities (optional).

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of facility to search for (default: hospital).

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return per page (default: 10).

optional_parameters.name: city
optional_parameters.description: The city name to filter the facilities (optional).

api_list.name: Geocode
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to lookup locations in Canada based on the provided address.
